Uses of Class
io.atomix.messaging.DistributedTopic

  • Packages that use DistributedTopic 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.messaging
    Provides distributed messaging resources such as DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging, and DistributedTaskQueue for asynchronous processing.

    • Uses of DistributedTopic in io.atomix.messaging

      Fields in io.atomix.messaging with type parameters of type DistributedTopic 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ResourceType<DistributedTopic> DistributedMessaging.TOPIC
      Distributed topic resource.
      static ResourceType<DistributedTopic> DistributedTopic.TYPE 
      Methods in io.atomix.messaging that return DistributedTopic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DistributedTopic<T> DistributedTopic.async()
      Sets the topic to asynchronous mode.
      DistributedTopic<T> DistributedTopic.sync()
      Sets the topic to synchronous mode.
      Methods in io.atomix.messaging that return types with arguments of type DistributedTopic 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceType<DistributedTopic<T>> DistributedTopic.type()
